name: Social Media Strategy
description: Develop a strategy for increasing engagement on a fictional brand's social media accounts.

name: SEO Fundamentals
description: Optimize a webpage for search engines, focusing on keywords, meta descriptions, and headings.

name: Python Basics
description: Write basic Python scripts to solve given coding problems.

name: Grammar Perfection
description: Identify and correct grammatical errors in sentences.

name: Intro to Neural Networks
description: Understand the basics of neural networks and complete simple tasks using machine learning models.

name: Graphic Design Basics
description: Create a visually appealing poster using design principles.

name: Financial Literacy
description: Solve budgeting and investment problems to improve financial decision-making.

name: Digital Marketing Analytics
description: Analyze a fictional brand's digital marketing data and derive insights.

name: Advanced SQL Queries
description: Write SQL queries to extract and analyze data from a database.

name: Creative Writing
description: Write a short story using a given prompt.
